languages.text: Предательство Мастера шепотов потерпело неудачу, однако цена за победу была высока.

traits.locale_text: Предательство Мастера шепотов потерпело неудачу, однако цена за победу была высока. Лорд-капитан Теодора фон Валанциус и наследник Эдельтрад погибли, а поврежденный пустотный корабль лишился тысяч членов экипажа. И все же надежда оставалась, ибо втор{mf|ой|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} династии Вольных Торговцев уцелел{mf||а} –

languages.text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.
languages.original_text: Предательство Мастера шепотов потерпело неудачу, однако цена за победу была высока.

traits.locale_text: The Master of Whispers' treachery was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost. Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius perished along with her heir, Edelthrad, and the damaged voidship lost thousands of crew members. Yet hope remained, for the second in line of the Rogue Trader dynasty survived —

The Master of Whispers' treachery was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost. Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius perished along with her heir, Edelthrad, and the damaged voidship lost thousands of crew members. Yet hope remained, for the second in line of the Rogue Trader dynasty survived —

The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost. Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius perished along with her heir, Edelthrad, and the damaged voidship lost thousands of crew members. Yet hope remained, for the second in line to the Rogue Trader dynasty survived —

The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost. Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius perished along with her heir, Edelthrad, and the damaged voidship lost thousands of crew members. Yet hope remained, for the second in line to the Rogue Trader dynasty survived —
The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

languages.text: 低语之主的背叛以失败告终，但这场胜利却付出了巨大的代价。
languages.original_text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

traits.locale_text: 低语之主的背叛以失败告终，但这场胜利却付出了巨大的代价。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长、她的继承人艾德萨德，以及数以千计的船员在这场叛乱中丧生。然而，希望并没有泯灭，因为行商浪人王朝的第二位继承人安然无恙。

languages.text: La traición del maestro de susurros fue en vano, pero la victoria se cobró un precio elevado.
languages.original_text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

traits.locale_text: La traición del maestro de susurros fue en vano, pero la victoria se cobró un precio elevado. La Lord Capitán, Theodora von Valancius, murió con su heredero Edelthrad y miles de tripulantes. Pero quedaba esperanza, ya que {mf|el|la} segund{mf|o|a} en la línea sucesoria seguía viv{mf|o|a}.

languages.text: 囁きの主の裏切りは無駄に終わったが、勝利には多大な犠牲を払った。
languages.original_text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

traits.locale_text: 囁きの主の裏切りは無駄に終わったが、勝利には多大な犠牲を払った。ロード・キャプテン、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはその後継者、エデルスラド、そして数千名の乗組員と共に亡くなったのだ。だが希望は残った。自由開拓者の王朝継承順位第2位の人物が生き残った。

languages.text: La trahison du maître des murmures fut vaine, mais la victoire eut un prix terrible.
languages.original_text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

traits.locale_text: La trahison du maître des murmures fut vaine, mais la victoire eut un prix terrible.

languages.text: Der Verrat des Meisters des Geflüsters blieb fruchtlos, aber der Sieg forderte einen hohen Preis.
languages.original_text: The treachery of the Master of Whispers was fruitless, but victory came at a great cost.

traits.locale_text: Der Verrat des Meisters des Geflüsters blieb fruchtlos, aber der Sieg forderte einen hohen Preis. Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius starb zusammen mit ihrem Erben Edelthrad und Tausenden von Crewmitgliedern. Dennoch bestand noch Hoffnung, denn die nächste Person in der Erbfolge der Freihändlerdynastie überlebte
